articles.content:
Italian Committee for Study of Songun Idea Formed 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Italian Committee for the Study of the Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty was inaugurated in Rome on Dec. 6 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
 Displayed at the venue of the inaugural ceremony were photos showing the undying Songun revolutionary leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.
 At the inaugural ceremony the above-said committee was declared to be formed and Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, was elected chairperson of the committee.    
 The chairperson said that the committee will conduct brisk activities to study and disseminate the philosophical principle of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and make positive contributions to defending and glorifying the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il.
